TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ReplicationConnection extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 類別代表複寫連接。

span.span: The class represents a replication connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Active Directory 網域服務，複寫連接會以 NTDS 連接物件。In Active Directory Domain Services, a replication connection is represented by an NTDS-Connection object. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「[NTDS 連接](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/c_ntdsconnection.asp)"在 MSDN Library 中的主題[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information, see the "[NTDS-Connection](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/c_ntdsconnection.asp)" topic in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

span.span: Demand value:

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public ReplicationConnection (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string name, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer sourceServer);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string name, class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer sourceServer) cil managed
Public Sub New (context As DirectoryContext, name As String, sourceServer As DirectoryServer)

param.name: context
param.span: 物件，包含要用來建立複寫連接的目標和認證。

span.span: A object that contains the target and credentials with which to establish a replication connection.

param.name: name
param.span: 連接的使用者定義名稱。

span.span: The user-defined name of the connection.

param.name: sourceServer
param.span: 物件，可識別連接的來源伺服器。

span.span: A object that identifies the source server of the connection.

summary.span: 使用指定的內容、名稱和來源伺服器，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified context, name, and source server.

exception.span: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

span.span: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

exception.span: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

span.span: The target server is either busy or unavailable.

Docs.exception:
下列任何一項原因都可能導致這個例外狀況發生。
This exception will occur for any one of the following reasons:
- 參數的目標不是網域控制站或 AD LDS 執行個體。The target of the parameter is not a domain controller or AD LDS instance.
- 無效或為空字串。 is invalid or an empty string.
- 在 參數中指定的目標不符合在 參數中指定的伺服器類型。The target specified in the parameter does not match the server type specified in the parameter.伺服器必須為網域控制站或 AD LDS 執行個體。The servers must both be either domain controllers or AD LDS instances.
- 在 和 參數中指定的伺服器為網域控制站，但不在相同的樹系內。The servers specified in the and parameters are domain controllers, but are not in the same forest.
- 在 和 參數中指定的伺服器為 AD LDS 執行個體，但不屬於相同的組態集。The servers specified in the and parameters are AD LDS instances, but do not belong to the same configuration set.

span.span: or is .
The credentials that were supplied are not valid.
